title: Special Topics in Intermediate Performing Arts; Arts, Leisure, and Entertainment: Urban Life in Modern Iran.
description:
Also offered as PERS398B, JWST319I, and HIST328C. Credit granted for PERS398B, HIST328C, JWST319I, or TDPS358B.

Interdisciplinary historical exploration of the formation and transformations of urban public culture in modern Iran. Taught in English.
